statements: UPDATE plant_data SET growth_rate = 0.5, pollutant_removal_rate = 0.7 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE plant_data SET plant_name = 'Fern', pollutant_removal_rate = 0.6 WHERE plant_id = 2;
UPDATE plant_data SET growth_rate = 0.5, pollutant_removal_rate = 0.3, plant_name = 'Slow-Grower' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE plant_data SET plant_name = 'Fast-Filter', pollutant_removal_rate = 0.8, growth_rate = 1.2 WHERE plant_id = 2;
UPDATE PlantGrowthData SET height=10.5, width=6.7 WHERE plant_id=101;
UPDATE PollutantRemovalRates SET removal_rate=0.8, pollutant_id=201 WHERE project_id=301;
UPDATE PlantGrowthData SET height = height + 10, width = width * 1.5 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE PollutantRemovalRates SET removal_rate = 0.8 WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE plant_growth_data SET growth_rate = 0.5 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE pollutant_removal_rates SET removal_rate = 0.75 WHERE plant_id = 2;
UPDATE plant_growth_data SET growth_rate = 0.05 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE pollutant_removal_rates SET removal_rate = 0.75, pollutant_type = 'CO2' WHERE plant_id = 2;
UPDATE PlantData SET growth_rate = 3.5 WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectData SET project_location = 'New Location' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE PlantData SET growth_rate = 0.35, growth_date = '2023-05-10' WHERE plant_id = 3
UPDATE PollutantData SET safe_limit = 12.5 WHERE pollutant_name = 'Carbon Monoxide'
UPDATE PlantGrowthData SET growth_rate = 0.05 WHERE plant_id = 1
UPDATE ProjectDetails SET location = 'New Location', project_name = 'Updated Project' WHERE project_id = 3
UPDATE PlantGrowthData SET growth_rate = 0.5, end_date = '2023-01-01T00:00:00' WHERE plant_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectParticipants SET role = 'Lead Researcher' WHERE project_id = 3 AND participant_id = 5;
